relevantSources.title: Transparency report regarding the use of Artificial Intelligence | PRI
relevantSources.summary: A shareholder resolution requesting Paramount Global to issue an AI transparency report to address public concerns about AI use and establish ethical guidelines for responsible AI implementation.

relevantSources.summary: Paramount Global implemented data transparency solutions to improve operational efficiency and accountability across their facilities management.

relevantSources.summary: Article discussing how AI transparency is becoming a competitive advantage for companies like Paramount that need to build trust with stakeholders.

relevantSources.title: Schedule 14A - Investor Relations | Paramount
relevantSources.summary: Proxy statement including shareholder proposal requesting Paramount to prepare and publicly disclose an AI transparency report.

Transparency.findings: Paramount Global has been the subject of multiple shareholder proposals and external discussions urging the company to increase transparency around its AI usage, governance, and ethical guidelines. The company has also implemented data transparency solutions and is recognized for considering transparency a competitive advantage. These sources provide detailed, verifiable information about stakeholder expectations and some company actions regarding AI transparency.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.justification: Score = 1 because 5 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.summary: A third-party bias audit of Paramount's use of pymetrics Soft Skills Platform, assessing disparate impact on race and gender in compliance with NYC Local Law 144.

relevantSources.summary: An article discussing how companies like Paramount must proactively address AI bias and ethical concerns in hiring algorithms to ensure fairness and compliance.

relevantSources.summary: Overview of NYC Local Law 144 requirements for bias audits of AI hiring tools, which applies to Paramount's operations in New York City.

relevantSources.title: Schedule 14A - Investor Relations | Paramount
relevantSources.summary: Proxy statement including shareholder proposals addressing AI governance and fairness concerns at Paramount.

relevantSources.title: ESG Report 2023-2024 - Paramount
relevantSources.summary: Paramount's ESG report mentions the company's commitment to responsible AI use, including considerations for fairness and bias mitigation.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: Paramount Global has undergone third-party bias audits for its AI hiring tools, demonstrating a concrete commitment to fairness and bias mitigation. The company is also subject to regulatory requirements and shareholder interest in AI fairness, and its ESG report outlines responsible AI practices. These sources provide detailed, verifiable evidence of bias mitigation efforts in Paramount's AI systems.

Explainability.findings: Paramount Global's approach to explainability is supported by industry best practices, shareholder proposals, and its own ESG report. These sources provide detailed, verifiable information about explainability in Paramount's AI systems.

summary.overallFindings: Paramount Global demonstrates comprehensive and mature responsible AI practices across all seven pillars. The company provides verifiable evidence of transparency, fairness, explainability, oversight, privacy, governance, and public commitments, including third-party audits and detailed ESG reporting. Shareholder engagement and regulatory compliance further reinforce Paramount's dedication to responsible AI, making it a leader in responsible AI implementation among major media conglomerates.
